controllers
Class Notify

java.lang.Object
  play.mvc.Controller
      controllers.CRUD
          controllers.Index
              controllers.Notify
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.classloading.enhancers.ControllersEnhancer.ControllerSupport, play.classloading.enhancers.LocalvariablesNamesEnhancer.LocalVariablesSupport
public class Notify
extends Index

This controller is in charge of pushing events into the event streams for the individual chat servers, as well as providing an interface for clients to listen to.

listen

public static void listen(java.lang.Long user_id,
                          java.lang.Long lastReceived,
                          java.lang.String callback)
Long poll for events relevant to facebook_id

Parameters:
facebook_id -
lastReceived - optional; the id of the last event seen. if omitted or zero, will assign to the most current event
callback - optional JSONP callback

joined

public static void joined(java.lang.Long for_user,
                          java.lang.Long new_user,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String server,
                          java.lang.String avatar,
                          java.lang.Long room_id)
Creates a new event signifying a user has joined a room.

Parameters:
for_user - the user id who will recieve this notification
new_user - the user id of the user who just joined
name - the name to be passed with the new user
server - the uri the new user is located on
avatar - url to display for the new user
room_id - the id of the room to join

message

public static void message(java.lang.Long for_user,
                           java.lang.Long from_user,
                           java.lang.String msg,
                           java.lang.String callback)
Creates a new event signifying a message from one user to another

Parameters:
for_user - the user id who will recieve this notification; note that this doesn't preclude more than one user from receiving this message, if there are more than 2 users in a room multiple events of this type will be generated.
from_user - the user id of the user who sent the message
msg - the text of the message being sent
callback - optional JSONP callback

roomMessage

public static void roomMessage(java.lang.Long for_user,
                               java.lang.Long from_user,
                               java.lang.String msg,
                               java.lang.Long room_id,
                               java.lang.String callback)
Creates a new event signifying a message from one user to another IN a chatroom.

Parameters:
for_user - the user id who will recieve this notification; note that this doesn't preclude more than one user from receiving this message, if there are more than 2 users in a room multiple events of this type will be generated.
from_user - the user id of the user who sent the message
msg - the text of the message being sent
room_id - the pertinent room for this message
callback - optional JSONP callback

userIsTyping

public static void userIsTyping(java.lang.Long for_user,
                                java.lang.Long user_id,
                                java.lang.Long room_id,
                                java.lang.String text,
                                java.lang.String callback)
Create a new event indicating the given user is currently typing

Parameters:
for_user - the user who should read this event
user_id - the user who is typing
room_id - optional, the room the typing is occuring in
text - the text that the user has typed so far
callback - optional JSONP callback

heartbeat

public static void heartbeat(java.lang.Long for_user,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.Long> room_ids,
                             java.lang.String callback)
http://localhost:9000/heartbeat?for_user=1&room_ids[0]=1&room_ids[1]=2&room_ids[2]=3 Record a heartbeat for the given user. Once we have recorded a heartbeat, this server will be in charge of keeping track of whether this user is still alive in the system. Once their heartbeat fades for more than User.HEALTHY_HEARTBEAT seconds, the master is notified that this user logged out

Parameters:
for_user - the user_id of the user logging out
room_ids - optional, list of rooms this user is currently in
callback - optional JSONP callback
